topic: What platforms are people using for Radiance
body:
I'm starting to look into several development projects, and one  
question that's come up is that all-time favorite, platform  
compatibility. And I've realized that I don't actually know what  
hardware and software people are using these days. A quick sweep of  
the mailing list doesn't find answers any more, so I figure I'd ask.  
My list of likelies is the big three:
  Mac OS X (PowerPC/Intel)
  Windows (Intel)
  Linux (Intel)


Anyone using anything else? Sun, perhaps? Old SGI systems?


Randolph Fritz
  design machine group
  architecture department
  university of washington
rfritz at u.washington.edu
